alert.note: Alert for Grand (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:30PM MDT until August 03 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grand County in east central Utah... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 429 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 25 miles east of Green River to near Moab, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Canyonlands Airport reported 60 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Castle Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Utah between mile markers 179 and 216. U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 128 and 157. Utah 128 between mile markers 0 and 44. Utah 279 near mile marker 15. Utah 313 between mile markers 11 and 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
